# Robert Santos

Dr. Santos received an MA in Statistics from the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor.  In 2021 president ASA, urban institute.  As a Mexican-American, he is the first non-white person to serve as the Director of the Census Bureau (appointed by Joe Biden in 2022).
